description: UIID32 Power Detection Plug Overload Alarm

sledOnline.description: Network Indicator Switch,turn on (on), turn off (off)

fwVersion.description: The current firmware version number, e.g. 3.4.0

chipid.description: Chip id, generally considered to be a fixed parameter of a chip. Each chip is unique

switch.description: Switches of channels: turn on (on), turn off (off)

oneKwh.description: Counting the electricity consumption: Start counting (start), stop counting(stop), refresh (get), Unit: KW.H

startTime.description: Start time for counting the current electricity consumption, Zero Time Zone

endTime.description: Stop time for counting the current electricity consumption, Zero Time Zone

hundredDaysKwh.description: Get historical electricity consumption for the past 100 days, Unit: Kwh

hundredDaysKwhData.description: 100 days of daily electricity consumption in hexadecimal, expressed as an all lowercase string, 600 bytes, to two decimal places. Unit: KW.H. If the total daily electricity consumption for 100 days is: 25.11, 25.31, 0.00, 0.00 ................ (Total 100 days) -> 190101190301000000000000 ..... The time order is that the current day is at the top, and the others go backwards

oneKwhData.description: The current electricity consumption value is expressed as a decimal string, accurate to 2 decimal places. Unit: KW.H,Value Range: [0‚Äê50000], e.g. 110.32
